title: preventing breaches
extract: Preventing a Data BreachKeep Only What You Need. Inventory the type and quantity of information in your files and on your computers. ... Safeguard Data. ... Destroy Before Disposal. ... Update Procedures. ... Educate/Train Employees. ... Control Computer Usage. ... Secure All Computers. ... Keep Security Software Up-To-Date.More items...
extract_html:
Preventing a Data Breach
  1. Keep Only What You Need. Inventory the type and quantity of information in your files and on your computers. ...
  2. Safeguard Data. ...
  3. Destroy Before Disposal. ...
  4. Update Procedures. ...
  5. Educate/Train Employees. ...
  6. Control Computer Usage. ...
  7. Secure All Computers. ...
  8. Keep Security Software Up-To-Date.
More items...
